# ManasNova - AI Wellness Platform

## Project Overview
ManasNova is an AI-based wellness and self-growth platform built with React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS.

## Tech Stack
- React 18
- Vite
- Tailwind CSS
- Modern ES6+ JavaScript

## Project Purpose
AI for Mindfulness, Focus, and Self-Growth - helping users stay calm, focused, and positive through personalized guidance, meditation, journaling, and habit tracking.

## Development Guidelines
- Use functional components with hooks
- Follow Tailwind CSS utility-first approach
- Keep components modular and reusable
- Maintain clean, readable code structure
